g:HTMLPanel.p: GWTMessages allows you to easily add success, warning, info and other types of messages to your application.

GWT Pages has a messaging system that you can use called GWT Messages. This is only used with GWT Pages through a page event handler so it is actually completely decoupled in case you need to use some other type of messaging system. All messages are cleared (when using the defaule messaging page event handler) whenever you browse to another page.
View the source for this page to see how the examples below are implemented.
